page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT-DUNTON GREEN AREA
page.content: Most industry is situated in the Dunton Green & Riverhead area. Chipstead is a quiet place. The West Kent cold storage complex,Marley(roof tile manufacturers),Plasmarc(plastics marketing) & Hodder & Stoughton (publishers) are the largest employers from 400-600 each,except Plasmarc with 70-80. Outside these, people work in small businesses e.g. shops, public houses, libraries, banks and schools. We conducted a survey on employment among the parents & learned that most D.G. parents worked locally, some travelled 7-8 miles, just a few go up to London. People working locally walked; nearly everybody else travelled by car.Most people living in Chipstead & Otford commute to London to work, mostly by rail, some by car.
